document.forum_title: Latest World News on One News Page
document.discussion_title: Students good at maths more likely to migrate
document.topic_text: Students good at maths more likely to migrate Monday, 22 August 2016 ( 14 minutes ago ) New York , Aug 22 : High school students who performed well academically and completed higher levels of maths and also had a greater sense of control of their future were more likely to migrate and work in labour markets with larger shares of college-educated workers, a study has revealed.
document.post: Students good at maths more likely to migrate Monday, 22 August 2016 ( 14 minutes ago ) New York , Aug 22 : High school students who performed well academically and completed higher levels of maths and also had a greater sense of control of their future were more likely to migrate and work in labour markets with larger shares of college-educated workers, a study has revealed.
